gossip info: Mohammed Al-Farsi expressed concerns that Juan Carlos Reyes, the trustee he has been working with, is not being entirely truthful about resource allocations. Mohammed values honesty in their dealings and plans to confront Juan about the discrepancies to protect his own reputation and maintain integrity in the investment community.
reasons: The source of this gossip, Mohammed Al-Farsi, has a strong reputation as a principled and capable investor.
